pop_cat_bio_trophy.zhcn_desc: 免除了伤害、苦难、甚至是自灭倾向的威胁，这些活着的生体陈设衣食无忧，一群不知疲倦的仆从随时满足他们的一切需求。
pop_cat_bio_trophy.en_desc: Sheltered from harm, suffering, and even their own self-destructive tendencies, Bio-Trophies want for nothing; their every need tended to and provided for by a team of tireless servitors.

pop_cat_precursor.zhcn_desc: 一个远古的失落帝国的主体物种，这些先驱者们所拥有的科技奇迹是年轻物种连做梦都不曾企及的。
pop_cat_precursor.en_desc: The dominant species in an ancient Fallen Empire, these precursors live among technological marvels that the younger races can only dream of.
